content: Joel Reardon Joel Reardon Affiliation Associate Professor at the University of Calgarye-mail addresspostal address Joel Reardon University of Calgary 2500 University Dr. NW ICT Building, ICT602 Calgary, Alberta T2N 1N4 About me: [Curriculum Vitae] Teaching Fall 2025: CPSC 526/626 Network System Security Winter 2025: CPSC 599/601: Mobile Security and Privacy Winter 2025: ISEC 631 Privacy by Design CVEs CVE-2022-23491 for removal of TrustCor certs in Certifi based on dev-security-policy discussion CVE-2021-31815 sensitive contact tracing is being logged. blog post explaining issue CVE-2020-0454 android apps able to get router SSID without holding permission. acknowledged for November 2020 CVE-2020-0293 access to sensitive network state due to a missing permission check Investigative Stories Washington Post coverage of Trustcor, a root certificate authority. Follow up reporting about Browser's distrusting the CA. Also on the register and Faculty of Science news. Google's response on their blog. Wall Street Journal coverage of Spyware SDK with ties to Packet Forensics and Vostrom. Subsequence BBC and Forbes Vice News coverage of Huq tracking users without consent and original research. Subsequent Vice News coverage of action against the apps. Further reporting from the BBC and the NRK Media Interviews Interviewed for Globe and Mail article on Running and Fitness apps. Interviewed for ICTjournal on the privacy flaw in Google's implementation of GAEN (en Francais). Interviewed for Markup Article on the privacy flaw in Google's implementation of GAEN Interviewed for Wall Street Journal Article on government surveillance. Interviewed for Online tracking investigation for Le Temps (en Francais). Interviewed for Wall Street Journal Article on TikTok's side channel use. Interviewed for What the Tech Podcast. Interviewed for El Pais (en Espanol). Interviewed for Mediapart (en Francais) Interviewed for a El Pais article related to apps circumenting the permission system (en Espanol). Interviewed for a CBC article related to protecting personal data. Interviewed for an episode of reply all related to apps and robocalls. Interviewed for an episode of CBC spark related to tracking of children by apps. Interviewed by the Financial times related to tracking and sharing of data by phones.
